name: Sylvie's Evening Glow Coffee
description: Put a warm glow in your cheeks with a special after dinner coffee mingled with winter spices and brandy. (Dollop with freshly whipped cream!)
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup, simmer brandy with sugar, Mulling Spices, orange peel, vanilla, and a cinnamon stick over medium-low heat for 6â€“8 minutes, until sugar dissolves and flavours blend.
Strain mixture and discard solids. Divide liquid between glasses.
If desired, carefully ignite mixture in each glass. Top each glass with coffee made in coffee press.
